verses.name: Ezekiel 30:16
verses.text: And I will set fire in Egypt: Sin shall have great pain, and No shall be rent asunder, and Noph shall have distresses daily.

verses.name: Ezekiel 30:17
verses.text: The young men of Aven and of Pi–beseth shall fall by the sword: and these cities shall go into captivity.

verses.name: Ezekiel 30:18
verses.text: At Tehaphnehes also the day shall be darkened, when I shall break there the yokes of Egypt: and the pomp of her strength shall cease in her: as for her, a cloud shall cover her, and her daughters shall go into captivity.
